implementation_summary: Implemented dynamic polling intervals for worktree status updates. Added POLLING_INTERVALS constant with three tiers: PROCESSING (2s) for active processing or waiting for response, SESSION_RUNNING (5s) for running sessions without active processing, and IDLE (10s) for all idle worktrees. Replaced setInterval with setTimeout-based adaptive polling that determines the next interval based on current worktree states. Added 5 unit tests for the getPollingInterval function covering all scenarios.
commits: 8689ea9: feat(polling): implement dynamic polling intervals for worktree status
message: TDD implementation complete. All 999 tests pass with 97.1% coverage for WorktreeSelectionContext.tsx. ESLint and TypeScript checks passed with 0 errors.
